title: To the Lighthouse - words in ironic contrast to

content.question: Charles Tansley’s sense of the words “fellowship” and “professorship” (eighth sentence) stands in ironic contrast to

choices.label: Mrs. Ramsay’s reference to “ugly academic jargon” (paragraph 3)

content.answer: Mrs. Ramsay’s reference to “ugly academic jargon” (paragraph 3)

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
